===Overview===
The '''New York Mets''' are an [[American]] professional baseball team based in [[Queens]], [[New York City]]. The Mets compete in Major League Baseball. The Mets are one of two Major League clubs based in New York City; the other is the [[New York Yankees (Earth-616)|New York Yankees]]. The team was formed in 1962 to replace the [[Brooklyn Dodgers]]. 

===Events===
[[Benjamin Parker (Earth-616)|Ben Parker]] a Queens native used to take his nephew [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Peter Parker]] to see Shea Stadium to view the Mets. This made Peter a long Mets fan. In Peter’s own words, the Mets are “a bunch of loveable losers who hit the occasional home run by accident.”{{r|Peter Parker: Spider-Man Vol 1 33}}
